Hi Jack, 

Thanks for sending these updates through, confirming the team actioned these yesterday. Here is an overview:

  • Link from homepage to Artiste medispa - to non surgical page - done
  • Welcome to artiste medispa - add content from page skin - done (note we added this below the CTA buttons)
  • Put the ponytail menu/tab after necklift - done
  • Facelift packages - put at the bottom of the page - done
  • Delete Artiste mini lift from the packages - done
  • FAQ - cost of facelift, link to general FAQ - done

Have a great weekend and speak soon,

Hi Jack, 

Hope you had a good week. Confirming we have worked through the document of new content. 

Here are the links to the updates areas:

  • Facelift https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/face-lift/
  • NeckLift https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/neck-lift/
  • Brow Lift https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/brow-lift/
  • Eyelid Surgery https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/blepharoplasty/
  • Pony Tail Lift (*New*) https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/ponytail-facelift/
  • Fat Transfer https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/fat-transfer-or-grafting/
  • Covid-19 process (*New*)  https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/contact-us/covid-19-process/
  • Out of Town patients (*New*) https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/contact-us/out-of-town-patients/
  • FAQ Procedure pages and general FAQ https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/general-faq/ (and relevant pages)
We did have a question regarding the non-surgical procedure section on pages 26-27. We added it here: https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/procedure/skin/ Let me know if that is what you were after? 

Have a great weekend and speak soon,
